Title: Jenkins Pipeline for Python Project
Description:
Developed a Jenkins pipeline to automate the build, test, and deployment process for a Python web application.

Background: Manual deployment was error-prone and time-consuming.
Acceptance Criteria:
Create automated pipeline for Python app
Implement unit test stage 
Set up deployment stages
Add monitoring and notifications
Success Notes:
Successfully implemented:

Reduced deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Achieved 95% test coverage
Zero failed deployments in first month
Added Slack notifications
Documented pipeline process
